scripts.gen: cp src/target.html target/game.html && cp build/build.min.js target/b.js && cp doc/icon.png target/ && cp doc/screen.jpg target/
scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production; npm run clean && npm run compileglsl && npm run concat && npm run minify && npm run gen && npm run zip
scripts.build-nominify: npm run clean && npm run copyglsl && npm run concat && npm run nominify && npm run gen
scripts.watch: npm run build-nominify; nodemon --exec 'npm run build-nominify' --watch src -e js,frag,vert
scripts.zip: cd target; zip -r ../target.zip .; cd ..; wc -c target.zip
scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run liveserver
